title: Biden Stresses Economic Optimism, Seeking Contrast With Republicans
description: Visiting Syracuse, N.Y., the president praised advanced manufacturing and criticized Republican plans for rising prices.
dc:creator: Jim Tankersley
media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden spoke at Onondaga Community College in Syracuse, N.Y., on Thursday to promote his administrationâ€™s effort to revitalize American manufacturing.
